mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, contents, creater_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime, hit_cnt FROM BOARD B WHERE B.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( title ,contents ,creater_id ,created_datetime ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{createrId}, NOW() )
